radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the lumbar spine
radiographic_examinations.findings: A multicystic intradural extramedullary mass extending from L3 till the sacrococcyx and a paravertebral multivesicular cystic mass with extension toward the iliac fossa, suggestive of a multivesicular hydatid cyst.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Control MRI 1 month later showed significant improvement of the intradural component; MRI after 10 months of treatment showed further reduction of lesion size and disappearance of the daughter cysts but no cyst calcification.

radiographic_examinations.findings: No cystic lesions in lungs, liver, or brain.
